item.title: Loan Against Property by HDBFS – Unlock the Value of Your Assets
item.description: Use your owned property to get high-value loans with competitive interest rates from HDBFS.

item.title: HDBFS LAP – Low Interest, High Value
item.description: Secure a loan against residential or commercial property at attractive interest rates.

item.title: Quick Loan Approvals on Mortgage Loans by HDBFS
item.description: Fast-track your funding needs with HDBFS’s streamlined property loan process.
